high_descs: Move to the desk on your left.
Pick up the CD on the desk.
Bring the CD to the left side of the desk by the lamp.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the CD in the light of the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: turn left and head to the table
pick up the disk on the table
move left to the desk lamp on the table
turn on the desk lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: turn on the desk lamp while holding a disk

high_descs: Grab the CD off the desk.
Walk to the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the CD under a lamp.
